title: Optimum DPI setting for Pixel 4 XL
content:
Hi community,

what is the optimum setting within developer settings for DPI? Currently the "small" setup is not small enough. I owned a pixel 2 prior to the new pixel and also altered the DPI settings to get more space on screen.

Does one recommend a good DPI setting which does not tamper with UI // causing other issues when using apps?

Boris
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4 XL
